data: Immerse yourself in a thrilling whodunit with our Murder Mystery Dinner Party. This unique experience combines suspense, intrigue, and fun, making it the perfect evening for mystery lovers. As a hosted event, all you need to do is gather your friends and family, and let the games begin. Our comprehensive package includes character roles, storyline scripts, and everything else you need to create an unforgettable night. Built in WordPress, this project showcases my skills in crafting engaging digital experiences.

This web application empowers Spotify users to effortlessly create and manage their music. Search a vast library, craft personalized playlists, and save them directly to your account. Its smart update feature ensures your existing Spotify playlists are refined, not duplicated, providing a seamless and organized music curation experience. Built using React, and the Spotify API, this project showcases my proficiency in building dynamic and interactive web applications.

FlexFit empowers you to take charge of your fitness journey with a sleek, responsive design. This website offers comprehensive tools and information, catering to both seasoned athletes and newcomers. Navigate with ease through its intuitive layout, and stay informed with the latest fitness trends via the blog section. FlexFit provides the perfect platform for enhancing your health and wellness, expertly crafted using custom HTML and CSS.
A Fusion of Floristry and Cafe Culture

Welcome to Flowercafe, a delightful blend of floral artistry and cozy cafe ambiance. Explore our WordPress store for exquisite floral arrangements, perfect for any occasion. Stay informed with our blog, featuring the latest cafe updates and delectable recipes. Enjoy a seamless experience with our user-friendly booking system for reservations. Whether you're seeking a unique gift or a tranquil escape, Flowercafe offers the ideal setting to unwind and indulge.

This WordPress website is a one-stop-shop for all things art, providing a unique platform for art enthusiasts to learn, grow and connect. Lillian Gray Art School offers a variety of art lessons for all ages and skill levels, as well as selling art supplies - making it the perfect destination for artists of all levels. Whether you're a seasoned artist or just looking to explore your creative side, this website has everything you need to unleash your inner artist.

A cutting-edge pharmaceutical company, Pharmacentrix is dedicated to revolutionizing the world of health and wellness. A WordPress website, it provides the latest information on medical innovation, products, and services. As a trusted partner in wellness, the company brings state-of-the-art solutions, ensuring access to the best products and information to improve life. The user-friendly interface and easy navigation make it easy for visitors to find what they need. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, Pharmacentrix strives to make a positive impact in the lives of its customers.

Vibrant Visions is a community-driven website that celebrates the beauty of art and creativity. Using a custom grid layout, the website showcases the diverse and colorful works of our community members. The website features a clean and modern design, with a focus on showcasing the art in a visually appealing way. The website also includes a blog section where community members can share their experiences and stories.
